parameters.name: EndMillis
parameters.description: The end time of the task execution, in 13-digit timestamp format.

parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description:
Set the language type for requests and received messages. The default is **zh**. Values:
- **zh**: Chinese
- **en**: English

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: Set which page to start displaying the query results from. The default value is 1, indicating the first page.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description:
Specify the maximum number of data entries per page when performing a paginated query. The default number of entries per page is 20. If the PageSize parameter is empty, it will return 10 entries by default.
> It is recommended not to leave the PageSize value empty.

parameters.name: PlaybookUuid
parameters.description:
The UUID of the playbook.
> You can obtain this parameter by calling the [DescribePlaybooks](~~DescribePlaybooks~~) interface.

parameters.name: RequestUuid
parameters.description:
UUID of the playbook task execution.
> You can obtain this parameter by calling the [DescribeSoarRecords](~~2627455~~) interface.

parameters.name: StartMillis
parameters.description: The start time of the task execution, in 13-digit timestamp format.

parameters.name: TaskStatus
parameters.description:
The status of the task execution. Values:

- **success**: Successful task.
- **failed**: Failed task.
- **inprogress**: Task in progress

parameters.name: TaskflowMd5
parameters.description: The MD5 value of the playbook configuration.

parameters.name: TriggerUser
parameters.description: The Alibaba Cloud account ID that executed the playbook task.
